casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Derrick Aundra HUEY. No. 355P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Oct. 26, 2015. Sarah Holladay, for Huey, Derrick Aundra. Alvin William Keller, Jr., Raleigh, for State of North Carolina. R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of October 2015 by the State for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of October 2015."
